game.name: DozTroy
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Shared/Split Screen Co-op, Shared/Split Screen, Full controller support, Camera Comfort, Playable without Timed Input, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: a game to let off steam for 5 minutes on your computer and release the pressure. Multiple weapons, game modes, fun. Want to destroy a spreadsheet with a minigun?
